name: Chompies!
description:
This game only supports local multiplayer


Chompies! is a cute couch sports game where you fight for the ball to reach the top of the level and score a goal. Battle it out against your friends or find random Chompies from around the world!

Some levels get harder to win when you play solo and aggressive, sometimes you need teamwork and betray one of the Chompies to WIN! but there is always only one winner.

Features:
  • 2 to 4 PLAYERS in Local Multiplayer

  • Juicy Chompies

  • 4 unique different environments

  • Over 20+ levels

  • Lots of cool obstacles
